price: अंततः उसने अपने पालनहार को पुकारा कि निःसंदेह ये अपराधी लोग हैं।
arabic: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوۡمٞ مُّجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: fadaʿā rabbahu anna hāulāi qawmun muj'rimūna
